question: who produced a change is gonna come
api_result: "A Change Is Gonna Come" is a song by American recording artist Sam Cooke. It was produced by Hugo & Luigi, who were the production team of Hugo Peretti and Luigi Creatore, and arranged and conducted by René Hall. The song was released on December 22, 1964, by RCA Victor. It is widely regarded as one of the most important and influential songs in the history of American music, particularly in the context of the Civil Rights Movement during the 1960s.
